titles.title: There Is No Name So Sweet On Earth

authors.author: George W. Bethune William B. Bradbury

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: We love to sing of Christ our King newline And hail Him blessed Jesus; newline For there's no word ear ever heard, newline So dear, so sweet as Jesus.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is no name so sweet on earth, newline No name so sweet in heaven; newline The name before His wondrous birth, newline To Christ the Savior given.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And when He hung upon the tree, newline They wrote this name above Him; newline That all might see the reason we, newline For evermore must love Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So now upon His Father's throne, newline Almighty to release us; newline From sin and pain He ever reigns, newline The Prince and Savior Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O Jesus, by that matchless name, newline Thy grace shall fail us never; newline Today as yesterday the same, newline Thou art the same forever.
